item.description:

item.title: Take cybersecurity and IT certification into your own hands for just $30
item.description: The Ultimate Cybersecurity and IT Career Certification Pathway Training Bundle is on sale for just $29.97 (reg. $184) through July 21.

item.title: Grab this '80s cartoon-inspired video game for $10 off on steam
item.description: For a limited time, you can score the Steam key to Mythforce, an 80s cartoon-inspired game for only $19.

item.title: Grab Atari Game Station Pro consoles for $50: Play 'Asteroids,' 'Centipede,' and 'Pong'
item.description: Get the My Arcade Atari Game Station Pro console (New - Open Box) for just $49.99 through July 21. Play over 200 classic video games.

item.title: Get Microsoft Office for your Mac or PC for life: Pay only $24.97
item.description: Bring home Microsoft Office Home & Business 2019 for Mac (or Microsoft Office Professional Plus for Windows) for just $24.97 now through July 4.Â

item.title: Bring your movies back to life with this fast DVD ripper on sale for $25
item.description: Finally clear out those old DVDs and keep watching your favorite films with the MacX DVD Ripper Pro, on sale for $24.97 (reg. $67.95) through July 21.
